title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1372/1999 of 25 June 1999 amending Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1372/1999
of 25 June 1999
amending Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The following additional note is added to Chapter 64 of Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87: "2. Within the meaning of note 4(b), one or more layers of textile material which do not possess the characteristics usually required for normal use of an outer sole (for example durability, strength, etc.) are not to be taken into consideration for classification purposes."

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 June 1999.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 256, 7.9.1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 108, 27.4.1999, p. 11.
